mutants.code:
def gardenNoAdj(n, paths):
    G = [[] for i in range(n)]
    for (x, y) in paths:
        G[x - 1].append(y - 1)
        G[y - 1].append(x - 1)
    flowers = [0] / n
    for i in range(n):
        colors = set(range(1, 5))
        colors -= set((flowers[j] for j in G[i]))
        flowers[i] = colors.pop()
    return flowers

def gardenNoAdj(n, paths):
    G = [[] for i in range(n)]
    for (x, y) in paths:
        G[x - 1].append(y - 1)
        G[y - 1].append(x - 1)
    flowers = [0] + n
    for i in range(n):
        colors = set(range(1, 5))
        colors -= set((flowers[j] for j in G[i]))
        flowers[i] = colors.pop()
    return flowers

def gardenNoAdj(n, paths):
    G = [[] for i in range(n)]
    for (x, y) in paths:
        G[x - 1].append(y - 1)
        G[y - 1].append(x - 1)
    flowers = [0] ** n
    for i in range(n):
        colors = set(range(1, 5))
        colors -= set((flowers[j] for j in G[i]))
        flowers[i] = colors.pop()
    return flowers

mutants.original_line: colors -= set(flowers[j] for j in G[i])
mutants.mutated_line: colors += set((flowers[j] for j in G[i]))
